lines.name: Maria
lines.text: You won't believe what I overheard last night at the terrace cafe!

lines.name: Maria
lines.text: I heard Sameer and Fatima talking. They mentioned an old debt, some deal gone wrong, and someone named "Giovanni"

lines.name: Amani
lines.text: Giovanni? That sounds familiar. But why would Sameer and Fatima be involved in such things?

lines.name: Maria
lines.text: The way they spoke scared me. They mentioned repaying 'with interest'. I'm worried about what they're caught up in

lines.name: Amani
lines.text: This sounds serious. We should find out more before jumping to conclusions.

lines.name: Maria
lines.text: What have you heard about Giovanni?

lines.name: Violeta
lines.text: We're supposed to meet at the movie, where are you?

lines.name: Shivan
lines.text: OMG, this is crazy

lines.name: Violeta
lines.text: What's crazy and are you going to make it?

lines.name: Shivan
lines.text: So I left my place early and, oh geez, one minute

lines.name: Violeta
lines.text: Shivan, are you ok?

lines.name: Preeta
lines.text: Did you two notice who walked in the party last night after the toast?

lines.name: Adisu
lines.text: I heard Jordan came unexpectedly‚Ä¶

lines.name: Preeta
lines.text: I mean Riley

lines.name: Adisu
lines.text: üò≥üò≥üò± how gone was I?!?!?

lines.name: Preeta
lines.text: no kidding, you should've seen Kamir's face üòí

lines.name: Adisu
lines.text: is that a shock reaction or a Kamir-style attempt at playing it cool?

lines.name: Preeta
lines.text: Ha, ha, now can you guess who Riley left with?

lines.name: Liana
lines.text: Hola K!

lines.name: Kris
lines.text: Heyo Li!

lines.name: Liana
lines.text: So I was inspired the other day to write about famous women in history.

lines.name: Kris
lines.text: That's cool, ones that are still relevant today?

lines.name: Liana
lines.text: For sure! I started with Ada Lovelace, the first programmer of what would become computers. She saw potential in using them to create Art and Music back in the 1800s!

lines.name: Kris
lines.text: I thought computers were created at the end of last century...

lines.name: Liana
lines.text: Right?!? Anyways, what have you been up to?

lines.name: Maria
lines.text: Can I please vent?

lines.name: Leo
lines.text: Sure, que pas√≥?

lines.name: Maria
lines.text: so my sister asked me to borrow money so we can split a mini cake, the kind we like from Sue's. She comes back, splits the cake, and I saved mine for this morning with a Cafecito. I get up late and there's two bites left. ARE YOU KIDDING ME?

lines.name: Leo
lines.text: Not cool

lines.name: Maria
lines.text: Ugh, she didn't even give me a real apology üò§

lines.name: Leo
lines.text: That's weak... so speaking of sibling issues there's these moths üêúü¶ã

lines.name: Leo
lines.text: They start as caterpillars and they produce a sweet milk that ants love. Then caterpillars bribe the ants with this treat, and the ants protect them from predators. Some ants even bring them into their nests. While some caterpillars eat the ant's food or get fed like the other ant babies, some go a darker path‚Ä¶ by eating their so-called siblings o_O.

lines.name: Maria
lines.text: Did you seriously type all that out?

lines.name: Leo
lines.text: Nah, copied from Reddit

lines.name: Maria
lines.text: It's only kinda related to my sister thing

lines.name: Leo
lines.text: Agreed

lines.name: Maria
lines.text: You're so weird, that's why I like you Leo!
